basics.name: Leiner Alvarado Rodriguez
basics.label: Computer Engineering Student | Fullstack & Unity Developer | Data Enthusiast
basics.summary: Final-year Computer Engineering student at the Costa Rica Institute of Technology, with hands-on experience in full-stack web development, Unity projects, and a solid foundation in data analysis. Currently strengthening skills in Python, SQL, Snowflake, and Databricks. Motivated to apply analytical and technical expertise in a professional setting through a Data Analyst or Software Developer role.

work.name: Bufost
work.summary: Developed responsive websites and SaaS platforms with Next.js, TypeScript, Firebase, and secure integrations.
highlights: Developed a responsive tourism company website using Next.js, TypeScript, and Firebase with SEO optimization.
Implemented Firebase Cloud Functions and optimized Firestore queries to reduce client costs.
Contributed to a SaaS platform for medical clinics with secure PayPal integration.
Collaborated under Scrum methodology with Jira for sprint planning.

work.name: Tecnológico de Costa Rica
work.summary: Unity developer in a multidisciplinary team building a metaverse project for the Costa Rica Institute of Technology.
highlights: Built C# scripts for spatial audio, player movement, and server synchronization.
Configured multiplayer functionality using Unity Game Services for real-time interaction.

projects.name: TransGaby Management System
projects.description: Travel, payment, vehicles and statistics management system using Astro, React, Flask and MySQL. A system that allows the management of the company's trips, payments, and payroll.

projects.name: TEC MAP
projects.description: Interactive map to guide you through the San Carlos Local campus, using QGIS and PostgreSQL
